title: The 10 Best Deals From Nordstrom’s Huge Summer Sale
text:
The first day of fall may not be for another few weeks, but most of us are already trading in our short-sleeved shirts for lightweight sweaters while we enjoy the great outdoors. That's right: Fall will be here before we know it, and if you're looking to welcome the chilly season in style, Nordstrom is here to help.

Now through September 8, Nordstrom is offering 40 percent off clothes, shoes, bags, and so much more. Sure, you might've thought you were all shopped out after this year's slew of Labor Day sales; however, Nordstrom's end of summer sale is a great opportunity to stock up on your fall essentials. Whether you want to hit the refresh button on your wardrobe this season, invest in a few staples, or buy some affordable summer clothes for next year, now's a better time than any to get shopping.

We know you don't have all day to scour through dozens of sales, we're sharing some of our favorite finds the men's sale section. What are you waiting for? Score the 10 best deals from this awesome sale before it's too late.
